Articles.Content: Been away from playing KSP for 5 months now, and I have finals in a few hours, but screw all that I'm boarding this train!!!
Can we break the active user record today?

This thread goes HYPER HYPER

![scooter-last.jpg](http://blog.myoon.com/wp-content/themes/tma/images/latest/scooter-last.jpg)
making coffee so as to synchronize take off with kerbal
Don't they still need to update the SteamDB?
Why are we not even slowing down the forums!?!?

I'm actually on a real train! I see the green fields of England and the.. 

HYPE!!!!!!
Holy crud we're at 1 page a minute! FASTER!!!
They're making final preparations! Hype like you've never hyped before!

> 
> Holy crud we're at 1 page a minute! FASTER!!!

Indeed! for the record!
We only need a \*few\* more people viewing the forum to set a new record.
None of the devs are logged into their forum accounts yet . . .
Go sanic fast!

a

\*STRAPS ON HYPERBOOSTERS TO TRAIN!\*

From KasperVid's Twitter

[https://twitter.com/KasperVld/status/592689647014281216](https://twitter.com/KasperVld/status/592689647014281216)

> 
> We only need a \*few\* more people viewing the forum to set a new record.

What is the active users record?
This is 1.0 for Pete's sake! We NEED to break the hype train record!!
The hype! OH MAN the hype!

> 
> Holy crud we're at 1 page a minute! FASTER!!!

![8.gif](http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/8.gif)

HYPE HYPE HYPE 

\*jumping up and down at the desk chair8
I can't log in twice, but if I could...

> 
> What is the active users record?

4k something something last I looked.

Hype alert! All hands to hype stations! Brace for release impact!
